mapper.select: select MBR_ID, PWD, MBR_GRD, MBR_TYPE_CD, MBR_STUS_CD, MBR_NM, EMAIL, MPNO, BD, SEX, ADDR_ID, MBR_PT, MBR_COUPN, COMMENT, SNS_YN, SUBS_DTM, MBR_GRD_DTM, CONN_TMS, LAST_LOGIN_DTM, FST_REG_DTM, FST_REGR_DCMT_NO, LAST_UPD_DTM, LAST_UPDR_DCMT_NO, AGRE_YN, SNS_DTM from member_info WHERE MBR_ID = #{MBR_ID};
